description:
The ultimate repair hack for cool-season lawns

Repair your cool-season lawns with three simple steps—weed, seed and feed establish grass.

Let Dandelion Doom quickly remove common lawn weeds, without harming a single blade of grass. Bare Repair Sun + Shade’s premium seed mix will then repair and nourish thinning or bare lawn patches. And for the lawn hack—Sunday’s Lawn Aid. Known for it’s heat-stress prevention and recovery, Lawn Aid will also help with new grass seedling establishment. The easiest 3-step to grow your greenest lawn yet.

Grow greener, healthier lawns right from the start with Sunday's sustainable grass seed and lawn care solutions.

sections.kit_benefits:
Complete 3-step lawn repair weed control, seed repair, and lawn treatment
Lawn-safe weed control eradicates unwanted weeds without harming grass
Premium climate-resilient seed for fast-growing, shade-tolerant cool-season lawns
Helps establish new grass surfactant aids in deep rooting and grass growth
Eco-conscious lawn care fertilizer and lawn repair made without harsh chemicals
Made for cool-season lawns in northern and transitional regions
Up to 3,000 sq. ft. coverage Ideal for small to medium-sized lawns
sections.whats_included:
2 Bare Repair Sun & Shade Lawn Treatment: Cool-season seed mixture, mulch, and nutrients for effective patch repair. Covers up to 65 sq. ft. per container.
1 Lawn Aid Heat Stress Prevention Treatment: Liquid lawn fertilizer treatment for heat resilience and grass establishment. Covers up to 3,000 sq. ft.
1 Dandelion Doom Herbicide Concentrate Refill: Post-emergent herbicide treatment to control broadleaf weeds, moss, and disease. Covers up to 224 sq. ft. of weeds.
Kit Equipment: Hose-end lawn sprayer and herbicide pouch with motorized wand sprayer for easy lawn application.
sections.instructions:
Connect the hose-end sprayer to the Lawn Aid pouch. Spray evenly across heat-damaged areas for 15 seconds or the entire lawn for preventive care. Let it dry fully.
Assemble the herbicide concentrate, pouch, and wand sprayer according to provided instructions. Apply Dandelion Doom as a spot treatment, ensuring full coverage for effective weed control.
Lightly rake seeding areas to ensure seed-to-soil contact for optimal growth. Seed Bare Repair at the recommended rate.
Water the seeded areas regularly, up to 1-2 times daily for 3 weeks, to maintain consistent soil moisture and aid seed germination.
Once 60% of the grass starts growing, apply any remaining Lawn Aid to support continued growth and lawn health.
Follow the 'Let's Yard Better' guide for continuous lawn care and maintenance.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
For the best results, apply Lawn Aid in temperatures between 50 and 85 degrees F, typically in the early morning or evening.
Seed Bare Repair Sun & Shade when daily temperatures consistently hold between 55-75 degrees F, usually in the spring and fall.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes, the Fescue Patch Kit can be effectively used with other Sunday lawn care products. Lawn Aid can be used in combination with your Custom Lawn Plan or other nutrients, just allow dry time between applications. If using weed control, apply before seeding for best results.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on the lawn after applying the kit?
It's safe to return to the lawn after the lawn treatment and seeded areas have dried. However, for optimal results, especially for seed germination, limiting traffic on the newly seeded areas is recommended until the grass is established.
When will I see results?
Fescue grass and perennial ryegrass seeds germinate (or grow) in 14 days, but may take more or less time pending conditions. Typically, Lawn Aid offers 4-6 weeks of heat protection, and results come with repeat use and application.
How to Apply Sunday Products in Order
Maximize your yard's potential with Sunday lawn care products. Apply in the correct order for the best results, ensuring a lush, thriving lawn and yard.
